alert.note: Alert for Pennington; Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 3:09PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Minnesota, including the following counties, Clearwater, Pennington, Polk and Red Lake. * WHEN...Until 630 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 309 PM CDT, the public reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fosston, Fertile, McIntosh, Erskine, Oklee, Gonvick, Winger, Mentor, Brooks, Maple Bay, Lengby, Gully, Trail, Terrebonne, Harold, Olga, Melvin, Roland, Dugdale and Marcoux.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
